      Description copied from interface: InitializablePlugin
      Parameters for the plugin, includes directories and parameters defined in config.xml.

      Parameters:

    • getRequiredParameters

      @Nonnull protected List<String> getRequiredParameters()
      Returns a list of required parameter names. These parameters (at a minimum) must be defined in the plugin registry, or else the plugin will fail when parameters are set during setParameters(Map).
      Returns:
      non-null list of required parameters

    • getAllProxyUserParameters

      @Nonnull protected List<String> getAllProxyUserParameters()
      Returns a list of all proxy user parameter names. These parameters are defined in the plugin registry and possibly used by API. setParameters(Map) will be logging warning messages if any of the name is not found or does not have a valid user entity.
      Returns:
      non-null list of all proxy user parameters
